reasoning.step2:
GrandTotal.Amount (extracted: -540.00)
- Evidence: Line "Gutschriftsbetrag in EUR: -540,00" clearly matches -540.00.
- Consistency: Matches sum of net and VAT (-450,00 + -90,00 = -540,00).
- Confidence: Very high.

Invoice.Date (extracted: 22.01.2024)
- Evidence: Top-right "Ebensee, am 22.01.2024" and "Lieferdatum: 22.01.2024".
- Consistency: Date appears in multiple invoice-relevant contexts.
- Confidence: Very high.

Sender.VatId (extracted: ATU21956408)
- Evidence: Footer shows "UID: ATU21956408" associated with Alpensalz GesmbH (sender).
- Consistency: Sender identity and UID colocated; no other sender UID present.
- Confidence: Very high.

Vat.Rate (extracted: 20)
- Evidence: Line items list "+ 20 % MWSt von -450,00" and earlier item shows "20%" in the item line.
- Consistency: VAT group used for amount calculation (-450,00 * 20% = -90,00).
- Confidence: Very high.

Net.Amount (extracted: -450.00)
- Evidence: "Gutschriftsbetrag excl. MWSt: -450,00" explicitly given.
- Consistency: Used as base for VAT calculation and sums to grand total.
- Confidence: Very high.

Vat.Amount (extracted: -90.00)
- Evidence: Line "+ 20 % MWSt von -450,00   -90,00" explicitly states -90,00 VAT.
- Consistency: Matches 20% of -450,00 and sums to grand total.
- Confidence: Very high.
